name: warzyw-templates
description:
A batch of highly alternative random map templates.
With time more templates will be converted to VCMI.
author: Warzyw647

1.01: doubled Brawl and Grond treasures to match their HotA versions
1.02: bugfix in Brawl object changes crashing the game
1.03: added a missing file in Brawl object changes
1.04: changed more banks in Brawl objects
banned external taverns and stables on Brawl
increased Brawl max size to m to allow 48x48 maps
limited each bank on Brawl to 2 per zone but reverted densities to 100 from 40
1.06: limited version for in branch 1.3 to vcmi 1.3.x and added branch 1.4 for vcmi versions 1.4+
1.07: added human player limit instead of ai player limit for compatibility with 1.4
1.09: Added template Brawl FFA to submod Brawl, a version of Brawl for 4 players
